extendedInfo.description: Teacher/Tutor Earnings Manager aka Tuition tracker is an app for all the teachers/tutors to help them keep track of their earnings.Two modes of Tuition Tracker:PERIODIC (Monthly/Quarterly/Annually) â when you charge in advance for a particular periodPER CLASS/LECTURE â when you charge for each class/lecture taughtKey features of PERIODIC mode: â¢Store/alter details about your students, subjects taught.â¢Add/alter fee receipt details of each student.â¢Display payment history of each student.â¢Display total fee received from all students for period specified.â¢Display students whose fee has become due.Key features of PER CLASS/LECTURE MODE: â¢Store/alter details about your students, subjects taught.â¢Store/alter details about classes/lectures you take.â¢Make entries on receipt of fee from students.â¢Display earnings (accrued & received) of teachers/tutors from each student subject-wise.â¢Display number of classes/lectures of each student subject-wise.â¢Display earnings (accrued & received) of teachers/tutors for period specified.â¢Graphical representation of above mentioned features.Upcoming features of Tuition Tracker app: â¢Backup/Restore all data.â¢Set reminders/alarms for future classes/lectures.â¢Automatic sending of âFee Dueâ reminder messages to students.We are also working on Tuition Tracker app for parents/guardians for keeping track of classes/lectures of their children, how much they spend on each teacher/subject etc.Keywords: - tuition, teacher, tutor, lecture, class, fee, earnings, student

reviews.title: Nicely done
reviews.comment: I like the way it is done, but it would be nice if you added a feature in which you can add a certain amount of money which the student paid vs the ammount of money he/she owes for the pay-per-class option.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but some fields needed
reviews.comment: It is a good for a teacher to track their student. But here some more fields required such as view all student details, roll or enroll number, find student etc.
reviews.author: Bikash Bhuyan

reviews.title: Nice App for Teacher
reviews.comment: Best forFees Record. We can be accurate with this. Thanx for free app. If there is paid version I widh to buy it. I have few suggestions like improve User Interface. Best App. My self Proprietor of Alankar Classes. Thank you.
reviews.author: Nilesh Ghadage

reviews.title: Good application
reviews.comment: This application works well but it would do better if some fields were added

reviews.title: Samsng Y pro DS - SRam
reviews.comment: I will give 5 star if it can send fee recipt/reminder msg. to student. And also selected period starts from admition date, not from fee recipt date automatically. But it is realy good work. Pls. Keep updates regulerly.
